results.title: Simvastatin increases circulating endothelial progenitor cells and reduces the formation and progression of diabetic retinopathy in rats.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ increases circulating @<m>DISEASE_Fuchs</m>'<m>_Endothelial_Dystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005642 @@@endothelial@@@ progenitor cells and reduces the formation and progression of @DISEASE_Diabetic_Retinopathy @DISEASE_MESH:D003930 @@@diabetic retinopathy@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Influence of simvastatin on aspects of thrombogenesis in CAPD patients.
results.text_hl: AIM: To determine the effects of 6 months' treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on platelet function and some hemostatic parameters, markers of @<m>DISEASE_Fuchs</m>'<m>_Endothelial_Dystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005642 @@@endothelial@@@ cell @DISEASE_Wounds_and_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D014947 @@@injury@@@, in 14 CAPD @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@.
